name: Drug Transport across Biological Membranes
description: The goal of this course is to provide students with knowledge of the molecular processes involved in drug transport across biological cell membranes with emphasis on their physiological and clinical significance. This course is restricted to Pharmaceutical Chemistry Specialist program students.
department: The Leslie Dan Faculty of Pharmacy
prerequisites: PHC301H1, and enrolled as a Year 4 student in the Pharmaceutical Chemistry specialist program.
